privacy_description: Comprehensive Privacy Notice of Donde Bailar MX. Learn how we protect and use your personal data in accordance with LFPDPPP.
privacy_intro: Donde Bailar MX (hereinafter, "Donde Bailar MX", "the Platform" or "the Responsible Party"), makes available to users this Comprehensive Privacy Notice, in compliance with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties, its Regulations and other applicable provisions.
privacy_regulates: This Notice regulates the processing of personal data collected through:
privacy_source_2: Official mobile applications for iOS and Android
privacy_source_3: Forms, internal features and related services
privacy_section_1_title: 1. Identity and address of the Responsible Party
privacy_applies_to_6: Customers and payment recipients within the Platform
privacy_section_2_includes: Includes the use of the Platform as a directory, social network, event/class management system and digital marketplace with intermediary payments.
privacy_data_3_2_3: Dance role (lead, follow, both or other)
privacy_data_3_2_7: Optional information that the user decides to publish
privacy_section_3_3_title: 3.3 Professional profile data (teacher, academy, organizer, brand)
privacy_data_3_4_intro: In case of enabling payments within the Platform:
privacy_data_3_4_1: Data necessary to link a payment account (e.g., account holder name, bank account, CLABE)
privacy_data_3_4_warning: Donde Bailar MX does not store complete bank card data. All financial information is processed directly by Stripe, in accordance with its own security and privacy standards.
privacy_data_3_5_note: This data is not stored in the main database and is received only by internal email.
privacy_data_3_8_intro: When the user logs in with third parties (Google, Facebook):
privacy_purpose_4_1_2: Allow the use of web and mobile app features
privacy_purpose_4_1_3: Display public profiles within the community
privacy_purpose_4_1_7: Manage charges and payments through Stripe
privacy_purpose_4_1_8: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
privacy_purpose_4_2_oppose: You can object to these purposes by writing to:
privacy_moderation_intro: Donde Bailar MX aims to create a positive community and a safe space for all users. To ensure this purpose:
privacy_moderation_1: Platform administrators have the authority to review, moderate, hide (take down) or delete any content that:
privacy_moderation_reason_6: Does not comply with the Platform's terms and conditions
privacy_moderation_2: This moderation applies to profiles, posts, comments, images, videos and any other content generated by users
privacy_moderation_3: Users whose content is removed will be notified when possible, and may request a review of the case
privacy_moderation_goal: Moderation is carried out with the aim of maintaining a respectful and safe environment for the entire dance community.
privacy_payments_1: Donde Bailar MX operates as a technological intermediary platform.
privacy_payments_4: The amount may initially be received by Donde Bailar MX
privacy_payments_5: Subsequently, the amount is transferred to the corresponding user minus the applicable commission
privacy_payments_6: The entire flow is carried out exclusively within Stripe
privacy_payments_7: Donde Bailar MX is not a financial institution, does not grant credits, nor does it support tax or legal obligations of the user receiving the payment.
privacy_sensitive_data: Donde Bailar MX does not request sensitive data. If the user decides to share it voluntarily in open fields, they do so at their own risk.
privacy_transfer_9_3: Donde Bailar MX does not sell or rent personal data.
privacy_cookies_note: Third-party analytics tools are currently not used.
privacy_retention_2: For the time necessary to comply with legal obligations
privacy_arco_intro: You can exercise your rights to:
privacy_breach_intro: In case of an incident, Donde Bailar MX:
privacy_breach_4: Will collaborate with authorities when applicable
privacy_section_15_title: 15. Limitation of liability for security incidents
privacy_liability_intro: Donde Bailar MX will not be responsible for:
privacy_liability_exception: Except when gross negligence or willful misconduct is proven.
privacy_acceptance_1: You declare that you have read and understood this Notice
privacy_acceptance_2: You accept the processing of your data in accordance with what is established here
privacy_questions: Do you have questions about your privacy?
proposal_subtitle: Commercial proposal for academies and teachers
proposal_badge: ‚úÖ Free integration ‚Äî Limited spots for partner academies and teachers
proposal_hero_title:
More students. Better occupancy.
Less improvisation.
proposal_hero_lead_1: Imagine that every Monday, instead of waiting for someone to ask you on WhatsApp if there's a class, you already have students actively looking for you. People who know exactly what rhythm they want, in what area and at what time.
proposal_hero_lead_2: That's what happens when your academy or your profile as a teacher is on Donde Bailar. It's not just another platform: it's the place where intention meets offer. Where those looking for class today, find you today.
proposal_pain_title: The problems we all face (and how we solve them)
proposal_pain_intro: Whether you have an academy or teach independently, these pains are universal. And they all have a solution when the offer meets real intention.
proposal_pain_1_sub: Demand concentrates on weekends and depends on content "peaks". You don't know which class fills more or which schedule is best to open.
proposal_pain_1_solution: They find you when they actively search. You appear in searches by zone, schedule and rhythm. Students looking for class today, find you today. And you have metrics to know what works best.
proposal_pain_2_title: The chaos of messages and scattered offer
proposal_pain_2_sub: WhatsApp, Instagram, calls... "What rhythms do you teach?", "What time?", "Where are you?". Your offer gets lost among posts and stories. Information is scattered and confusing.
proposal_pain_2_solution: Everything is clear from the start: location, levels, schedules, rhythms and modality. A profile that speaks for you and generates trust from the first glance. The student decides before contacting you.
proposal_benefits_title: What really changes when you're on Donde Bailar
proposal_benefits_intro: We're not talking about technical features. We're talking about real results: more students who arrive ready to take class, better reputation that builds over time, and growth you can measure and control.
proposal_benefit_1_title: Students who arrive ready to take class
proposal_benefit_1_desc: They're not curious people asking "just in case". They're people who already know what rhythm they want, in what area and at what time. When they contact you, they're already convinced.
proposal_benefit_2_title: They find you when they search
proposal_benefit_2_desc: You appear in searches by zone, schedule, rhythm and level. You don't depend on someone recommending you: you're where people actively search.
proposal_benefit_3_title: Announce classes and events without complications
proposal_benefit_3_desc: Publish your regular classes, special events, socials and workshops. Everything in one place, with all information clear: schedules, levels, rhythms, location and prices.
proposal_benefit_4_desc: Reviews, followers and consistency. Every class you give, every event you announce, adds to your reputation. It becomes an asset that grows over time.
proposal_benefit_5_desc: You know what attracts more interest, what schedule converts better, and where your next opportunity is. You decide with information, not assumptions.
proposal_benefit_6_desc: We're looking for partner academies, teachers and organizers to build the best dance map. If you share our vision of making dance more accessible, this is your opportunity.
proposal_teachers_title: For independent teachers and event organizers
proposal_teachers_intro: You don't need to have an academy to take advantage of Donde Bailar. If you teach independently or organize events and socials, here's your space to grow and connect with more people.
proposal_teacher_1_desc: Show who you are, what you teach and where. Academies can invite you to collaborate. A profile that speaks for you and generates trust.
proposal_teacher_2_desc: Publish your socials, workshops, competitions or special events. Create multiple dates easily. People looking for events in your area, find you.
proposal_teacher_3_desc: Set prices by date, handle discounts, and if you want, integrate online payments. Everything organized and visible so people know when and how to participate.
proposal_close_title: Ready to be part of Donde Bailar
proposal_close_intro: If your priority is to give a great experience and grow with order, this is your moment. Whether you have an academy, teach independently, or organize events: Donde Bailar is your new channel to connect with those looking for dance.
